items.sentence: You aren\'t wearing that to the party, are you?
A year\'s supply of the medicine costs $50,000.
I wish my friends could\'ve been there with me.
I wish we didn\'t have to wait three more days.
I wish you\'d stick around for a few more days.
I wish you\'d stop calling me so late at night.
Tom sat down on the log and took off his boots.
Tom told me that he\'s never been to a funeral.
Tom and Mary plan to get married after college.
Tom and Mary played cards together all evening.
